mapper.insert:
insert into oa_button_set
PROC_DEF_KEY_,
TASK_DEF_KEY_,
i_proc_button_id,
i_button_id,
i_order,
i_permit_type,
i_is_creater,
i_is_reader,
i_is_lastsender,
i_is_transactors,
i_is_default,
i_TASK_DEF_KEY_,
s_manager_role_id,
s_roles,
#{procDefKey},
#{taskDefKey},
#{iProcButtonId},
#{iButtonId},
#{iOrder},
#{iPermitType},
#{iIsCreater},
#{iIsReader},
#{iIsLastsender},
#{iIsTransactors},
#{iIsDefault},
#{iTaskDefKey},
#{sManagerRoleId},
#{sRoles},
mapper.select: select i_id,s_roles,PROC_DEF_KEY_,TASK_DEF_KEY_,i_proc_button_id,i_button_id,i_order, i_permit_type,i_is_creater,i_is_reader,i_is_lastsender,i_is_transactors,i_is_default, i_TASK_DEF_KEY_,s_manager_role_id from oa_button_set where i_id = #{id}

select b.i_id,b.s_roles,b.PROC_DEF_KEY_,b.TASK_DEF_KEY_,b.i_proc_button_id,b.i_button_id,b.i_order, b.i_permit_type,b.i_is_creater,b.i_is_reader,b.i_is_lastsender,b.i_is_transactors,b.i_is_default, b.i_TASK_DEF_KEY_,b.s_manager_role_id from oa_button_set b LEFT JOIN oa_proc_button a ON a.i_id = b.i_proc_button_id where b.i_proc_button_id = #{id}

select i_id,s_roles,PROC_DEF_KEY_,TASK_DEF_KEY_,i_proc_button_id,i_button_id,i_order, i_permit_type,i_is_creater,i_is_reader,i_is_lastsender,i_is_transactors,i_is_default, i_TASK_DEF_KEY_,s_manager_role_id from oa_button_set where i_proc_button_id = #{id} and PROC_DEF_KEY_ = #{procDefKey}

select i_id,s_roles,PROC_DEF_KEY_,TASK_DEF_KEY_,i_proc_button_id,i_button_id,i_order, i_permit_type,i_is_creater,i_is_reader,i_is_lastsender,i_is_transactors,i_is_default, i_TASK_DEF_KEY_,s_manager_role_id from oa_button_set where i_button_id = #{id}
select * from oa_button_set order by i_order
mapper.insert:
insert into oa_button_set(
PROC_DEF_KEY_, TASK_DEF_KEY_, i_proc_button_id, i_button_id, i_order, i_permit_type, s_roles, i_is_creater, i_is_reader, i_is_lastsender, i_is_transactors, i_is_default, i_TASK_DEF_KEY_, s_manager_role_id )VALUES
( #{pojo.procDefKey},#{pojo.taskDefKey},#{pojo.iProcButtonId}, #{pojo.iButtonId},#{pojo.iOrder}, #{pojo.iPermitType},#{pojo.sRoles},#{pojo.iIsCreater},#{pojo.iIsReader}, #{pojo.iIsLastsender},#{pojo.iIsTransactors},#{pojo.iIsDefault}, #{pojo.iTaskDefKey},#{pojo.sManagerRoleId} )
